answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some example RFPs for records management.
The link below goes to the RFP for countywide records management and storage facility plan of Mercer County, NJ.
http://www.state.nj.us/counties/mercer/pdfs/exempt_rfpss200801.pdf
For more sample RFPs I included two RFPs dealing with software and electronic records management. 
One is from the city of Kirkland, WA.
http://www.kirklandwa.gov/Assets/RFP+Records+Management+System+Technical+Services.pdf
The other is from New York City.
http://www.nyc.gov/html/records/pdf/rfp_records_management_software_related_services_sample.pdf
I also included a vendor website called Archive Systems which seems to offer comprehensive services for records management.  They have regional offices in the northwest and one in Kent, WA.
http://www.archivesystems.com/about-us/locations.aspx
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Jon Amundson
text: Looking for examples of RFPs for a comprehensive records management plan. Would like it to include everything from the "boxes in the basement" to email retention and digital archiving. Have you had someone develop a plan for you? What did it include? What vendors are out there that offer this type of records management planning? Any information regarding this topic would be very appreciated.
title: Records Management Plan
